dmca.title: Illegal Footage - TAKE ME OUT photographs
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Chmiel, Michael [mailto:MChmiel@actorsequity.org] 
Sent: Thursday, February 10, 2005 10:23 AM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'
Cc: Greenwood, Ken; Garber, Joe; Beebe, Doug; Lambertz, Kurt;
'bretaaron@mac.com'
Subject: Illegal Footage - TAKE ME OUT photographs

Please see the attached.  Signed copies are being sent via fax and US Mail.
We appreciate your cooperation.
 <<Illegal footage - Hunkvideo.com.doc>> 
Best,
Michael Chmiel
Taping and Filming Representative
Actors' Equity Association
165 W. 46th St.
New York, NY 10036
212.869.8530 ext.341
212.719.9815 - fax
mchmiel@actorsequity.org
